raw_body: PERERA – GAMINI,​ Husband of Malkanthi,​ father of Asanka,​ Aravinda and Anushka,​ father-in-law of Jayarani,​ Raneshi and Shermal. Remains lie at 7,​ Seevali Lane,​ Wattala. Cortege leaves the residence at 3 p.m. on Friday 18th August for Burial at 3.30 p.m. at St. Anne’s Church,​ Wattala.051766
